alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Lamoille; Orange; Orleans; Washington; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 14 at 2:19AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Moderate to heavy showers will impact portions of Lamoille, northwestern Orange, west central Caledonia, Orleans, eastern Chittenden, Washington and Franklin Counties through 315 AM EDT... At 217 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hyde Park, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Moderate to locally heavy rainfall may result in ponding in urban areas and near clogged storm drains. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Ponding on roadways possible. Drive carefully overnight to avoid hydroplaning. Locations impacted include... Barre, Montpelier, Newport City, Morrisville, Enosburg Falls, Orleans, Derby Center, Franklin, Jay, Newport Town, Cambridge, Glover, Waterbury Village, Montgomery Center, Websterville, Albany, Westford, Worcester, Middlesex and Sheldon. This includes the following highways... Interstate 89 between mile markers 42 and 78, and mile marker 116 and near mile marker 129. Interstate 91 between mile markers 154 and 177. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Caledonia; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Lamoille; Orange; Orleans; Washington; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin
